section.class: et_pb_module et_pb_fullwidth_header et_pb_fullwidth_header_0 et_hover_enabled et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark et_pb_fullscreen

div.h1:
Welcome to New Mexico
School for the Arts

p.span: The New Mexico School for the Arts is a public, statewide high school that serves young artists with a rigorous, award-winning arts training and academic program.

section.class: et_pb_module et_pb_fullwidth_header et_pb_fullwidth_header_1 et_hover_enabled et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_2 et_section_regular section_has_divider et_pb_bottom_divider et_pb_top_divider

div.p: Where Passion Leads to Extraordinary Results

p.span: We believe a student’s passion for the arts can propel them to success in every aspect of life. We are committed to fostering that success by providing a strong foundation for artistic and academic growth in an inclusive and challenging environment that encourages exploration, expands imagination and cultivates creativity.
If you believe in the power of the arts, and want to support young artists, please consider giving to our arts program so we can continue to help students thrive!

h2.a: NMSA opens its doors for a community open house

div.div: Caption: Santa Fe Chamber of Commerce ribbon cutting celebrating the opening of NMSA's permanent...

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_6 et_section_specialty section_has_divider et_pb_bottom_divider et_pb_top_divider
et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

p.span: Deeply connected to New Mexico, NMSA is proud to serve 250 students from 39 communities and Pueblos across the state. NMSA brings these artist-scholars together–many of whom hail from rural areas–to experience the richness of New Mexico arts history, culture and industry, thanks to generous partnerships with local organizations such as the Institute of American Indian Arts, SITE Santa Fe and Meow Wolf, and renowned artists and galleries. With these resources, NMSA augments studio and classroom work with in-the-field instruction, presentations, performances, exhibitions and internships.

div.p: New Mexico School for the Arts helps students cultivate their own artistic voice, fostering broad intellectual development, so that in addition to developing strong technique, students will begin to refine their personal artistic vision and purpose, and the means to communicate that vision through their art.

p.span: At New Mexico School for the Arts, student portfolios are continually growing and evolving, documenting the challenges and successes of student work and enabling students to become more aware of and invested in their own growth and learning as they prepare for life after high school. Follow the links above to see student works!

div.p: New Mexico School for the Arts helps students cultivate their own artistic voice, fostering broad intellectual development, so that in addition to developing strong technique, students will begin to refine their personal artistic vision and purpose, and the means to communicate that vision through their art.

p.span: At New Mexico School for the Arts, student portfolios are continually growing and evolving, documenting the challenges and successes of student work and enabling students to become more aware of and invested in their own growth and learning as they prepare for life after high school. Follow the links above to see student works!

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_9 et_section_regular section_has_divider et_pb_bottom_divider et_pb_top_divider
et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_0 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

p.span: “My time here has been invaluable. As I prepare to attend Juilliard, I know the rigor and support I’ve received at NMSA have given me the discipline I need to continue to grow.”

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_1 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.p: “The college preparation steps that NMSA takes even as early as 9th grade surprised us – it’s clear they take the advancement of these students very seriously and have established the infrastructure to back it up.”

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_2 clearfix et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.p: “We cheer for each other when we succeed, support each other when we fall, and lift each other up to try again.”

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_3 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

p.span: “I can’t think of a better place to support than a school that is preparing New Mexico’s kids so effectively for the future. Their results are inarguably some of the best in the state.”

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_12 et_section_regular section_has_divider et_pb_bottom_divider et_pb_top_divider
et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_11 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: New Mexico School for the Arts fosters a culture of respect to self, others, and the community at-large. We have created an education that supports the whole student: as an artist, a scholar, and a citizen. Our reach is statewide; students from across New Mexico are positively impacted by our programs.

, one of the nation’s highest honors in education

div.p: NMSA was recognized on Niche as the #1 in Best High School for the Arts in New Mexico and for having the Best Public High School Teachers in New Mexico.
Click below and sign up to receive important news and updates from NMSA!
